info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, west central Yellowstone, Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 719 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deadmans Basin Reservoir to 14 miles northwest of Columbus. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Broadview, Lavina, Franklin, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Shawmut, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Rapelje, Molt and Comanche. This statement does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
